name: gmickel-claude-marketplace (gmickel)
description: [项目级] Claude Code plugins for reliable AI coding. Flow-Next: plan-first workflows, Ralph autonomous mode (overnight coding with fresh context), multi-model review gates via RepoPrompt/Codex, re-anchoring to prevent drift, receipt-based gating.。来源: https://github.com/gmickel/gmickel-claude-marketplace

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Claude Code plugins for reliable AI coding. Flow-Next: plan-first workflows, Ralph autonomous mode (overnight coding with fresh context), multi-model review gates via RepoPrompt/Codex, re-anchoring to prevent drift, receipt-based gating.

来源: https://github.com/gmickel/gmickel-claude-marketplace
